languages.text: "А, снова вы. Мои приветствия! А мы тут вот — оцепление снимаем. Прошла вроде как эпидемия. Если она вообще была. Сейчас мы с ребятами огоньком пройдемся, и совсем хорошо станет!"

"Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"
languages.original_text: "А, снова вы. Мои приветствия! А мы тут вот — оцепление снимаем. Прошла вроде как эпидемия. Если она вообще была. Сейчас мы с ребятами огоньком пройдемся, и совсем хорошо станет!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, you again. My greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

"Ah, you again. My greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

"Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

"Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

"Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

languages.text: “啊，又是你啊，你好！如你所见，我们正准备撤除封锁线呢。很显然，疫情结束了，就好像从来没发生过一样。我和我的小伙子们正准备在这个地方点几把火，到时候这里看起来就会好多了！”
languages.original_text: "Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

traits.locale_text: “啊，又是你啊，你好！如你所见，我们正准备撤除封锁线呢。很显然，疫情结束了，就好像从来没发生过一样。我和我的小伙子们正准备在这个地方点几把火，到时候这里看起来就会好多了！”

languages.text: «¡Ah, usted otra vez! Estamos eliminando el cordón, como puede ver. Por lo visto, la epidemia ha terminado, si es que existía en primer lugar. Los muchachos y yo vamos a chamuscar un poco la zona, ¡y todo listo!».
languages.original_text: "Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah, usted otra vez! Estamos eliminando el cordón, como puede ver. Por lo visto, la epidemia ha terminado, si es que existía en primer lugar. Los muchachos y yo vamos a chamuscar un poco la zona, ¡y todo listo!».

languages.text: 「あぁ、またお会いしましたね、陛下！ご覧の通り、非常線を取り払っているところなんです。流行病も落ち着いたようですね。あれが病気だったらの話ですが。私と仲間達であとちょっと現場を焼き払えば、もう問題ありませんよ！」
languages.original_text: "Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、またお会いしましたね、陛下！ご覧の通り、非常線を取り払っているところなんです。流行病も落ち着いたようですね。あれが病気だったらの話ですが。私と仲間達であとちょっと現場を焼き払えば、もう問題ありませんよ！」

languages.text: "Ah, Ihr seid es wieder. Seid gegrüßt! Wir sind gerade dabei, die Absperrung zu entfernen. Die Epidemie ist anscheinend vorüber. Will sagen, falls es jemals eine gab. Ich und die Jungs fackeln den Laden hier noch ein wenig ab, und dann ist wieder alles in bester Ordnung!"
languages.original_text: "Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Ihr seid es wieder. Seid gegrüßt! Wir sind gerade dabei, die Absperrung zu entfernen. Die Epidemie ist anscheinend vorüber. Will sagen, falls es jemals eine gab. Ich und die Jungs fackeln den Laden hier noch ein wenig ab, und dann ist wieder alles in bester Ordnung!"

languages.text: « Ah, c'est encore vous. Bonjour ! On était justement en train de retirer le cordon. L'épidémie est terminée, il paraît. Si tant est qu'elle a jamais existé, bien sûr. On va nettoyer un peu l'endroit avec mes gars, et puis tout sera comme avant ! »
languages.original_text: "Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

traits.locale_text: « Ah, c'est encore vous. Bonjour ! On était justement en train de retirer le cordon. L'épidémie est terminée, il paraît. Si tant est qu'elle a jamais existé, bien sûr. On va nettoyer un peu l'endroit avec mes gars, et puis tout sera comme avant ! »

languages.text: "Tekrar hoş geldiniz! Biz de tam kordonu kaldırıyorduk. Belli ki salgın sona ermiş. Gerçi salgın mıydı, ondan da emin değiliz ya. Neyse, ekiple burayı biraz harlayacağız, sonra cillop gibi olacak!"
languages.original_text: "Ah, you again. Greetings! We were just in the middle of removing the cordon, you see. The epidemic's over, apparently. If there ever was one, that is. Me and the lads are gonna light the place up a bit, and then it'll be right as rain!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, demek sizdiniz. Merhabalar! Tam da kordonu kaldırıyorduk. Anlaşılan salgın sona erdi. Ne oldu bitti bilmiyoruz ya... Ekiple burayı biraz ışıklandıracağız, böylece işler rayına girecek!"
